connection_id.description: The connection ID to send the fax with.

from_display_name.description: The `from_display_name` string to be used as the caller id name (SIP From Display Name) presented to the destination (`to` number). The string should have a maximum of 128 characters, containing only letters, numbers, spaces, and -_~!.+ special characters. If ommited, the display name will be the same as the number in the `from` field.

t38_enabled.description: The flag to disable the T.38 protocol.

monochrome.description: The flag to enable monochrome, true black and white fax results.

store_media.description: Should fax media be stored on temporary URL. It does not support media_name, they can't be submitted together.

store_preview.description: Should fax preview be stored on temporary URL.

preview_format.description: The format for the preview file in case the `store_preview` is `true`.

webhook_url.description: Use this field to override the URL to which Telnyx will send subsequent webhooks for this fax.

client_state.description: Use this field to add state to every subsequent webhook. It must be a valid Base-64 encoded string.
